title: Award-Winning Mornington Peninsula Escape with A$100 Drinks & Dining Credit
description:
Hidden an hour from Melbourne, in the picturesque Mornington Peninsula wine region, Lancemore Lindenderry Red Hill is the perfect country retreat. Dial up the romance with a stroll through 14 hectares of manicured gardens, enjoy a picnic hamper by the glistening lake, sip award-winning wines at the cellar door, and relax amid romantic nooks, sprawling vines and cosy fireplaces.

Recognised as one of Australia’s best hotels in the 2019 Condé Nast Traveler Readers’ Choice Awards, this boutique hotel will seduce you with daily à la carte breakfast, A$100 food and drinks credit per room towards purchases from the paddock-to-plate creations of The Dining Room or the award-winning cellar door, and two farewell bottles of signature Lindenderry wine.
offer_address: 142 Arthurs Seat Rd, Red Hill VIC 3937

vendor_name: Woodman Estate Luxury Country Hotel Spa Retreat
title: Romantic Mornington Peninsula Retreat with Signature High Tea
description: Whisk someone special away for a beautiful lakeside retreat among lush green gardens at Woodman Estate Luxury Country Hotel. Featuring elegant décor and friendly hospitality, this exceptional countryside hotel places you near stunning local wineries, gourmet dining and the famous hot springs of the Mornington Peninsula. Spend your days exploring the region, then return to this tranquil country estate to enjoy award-winning dining in the onsite restaurant.
offer_address: 136 Graydens Rd, Moorooduc VIC 3933, Australia

title: Mornington Peninsula Private Hideaway for up to Eight Guests near Mount Martha's South Beach
description: Escape to Victoria's Mornington Peninsula with a charming getaway at The Hideaway at Mount Martha, a contemporary beach house nestled on an expansive property near the shores of Port Phillip Bay. This family-friendy escape is only minutes away from some of Mornington's best wineries and restaurants, including Foxeys Hangout, Red Hill Estate, Montalto and Ten Minutes By Tractor. Just a five-minute drive from Mount Martha Beach South, feel at home in this spacious sanctuary, featuring four bedrooms, a fully equipped kitchen, living and dining spaces and a covered outdoor deck. Plunge into the glittering in-ground swimming pool, soak your worries away in the six-seater Vortex spa or take a long walk amid the manicured lawns.
offer_address: 45-47 Finlayson Avenue, Mount Martha, Victoria 3934 Australia

title: Five-Star Mornington Peninsula Ocean-View Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Unearth contemporary luxury shaped by nature at RACV Cape Schanck Resort, a five-star coastal oasis nestled on the southern edge of the striking Mornington Peninsula. Home to state-of-the-art facilities including an architecturally designed spa and a par-70 championship 18-hole golf course, this resort is the jewel in the RACV crown - a design masterpiece inspired by the coast’s dramatic landscape and forged by nature’s elements. The resort's location on scenic Cape Schanck takes you close to the wineries, breweries and pristine beaches of this stunning part of Victoria.

Your luxury coastal escape includes daily breakfast, daily A$25 drinks and dining credit per room to use at any of the resort’s restaurants and bars, unlimited in-house movies, 11am checkout and local experiences including daily two-for-one tasting paddles when dining at the popular St Andrews Beach Brewery and complimentary access for two adults to Pt. Leo Estate Sculpture Park.

**Travelling with family?** Upgrade to the Superior Family Room for two adults and two children (aged 12 years and under).

**Are you an RACV Member?** Enjoy an additional A$25 drinks and dining credit per room daily, discounts on RACV ticketing and a later 12pm checkout.
offer_address: Trent Jones Dr, Cape Schanck VIC 3939

title: Serene Mornington Peninsula Escape with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & Two Championship Golf Courses
description:
Swing into a secluded coastal escape at this romantic retreat, perfectly located only moments from the award-winning Alba Thermal Springs & Spa. Crowning the entry to two 18-hole championship golf courses, this upscale oasis boasts sweeping vistas from every angle, with each room and suite offering private balconies with glorious rolling green views.

Enjoy easy day trips to local vineyards and stunning coastal locales, like Cape Schanck and Rye Ocean Beach. Then return to savour every bite at spectacular onsite Pebbles Restaurant, which showcases the best of the Victoria's seasonal produce, expertly paired with exquisite local wines - chips triple-fried in duck fat, stuffed king mushrooms and olive oil cake parfaits await.
offer_address: 55 Peter Thomson Drive, Fingal 3939, Victoria, Australia

title: Relaxing Mornington Peninsula Peppers Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience a secluded coastal escape at Mornington Peninsula's Peppers Moonah Links Resort - a romantic retreat perfectly located only moments from the award-winning Peninsula Hot Springs. Crowning the entry to two 18-hole championship golf courses, this upscale oasis boasts sweeping vistas from every angle, with each room and suite affording private balconies with glorious rolling green views. The spectacular onsite fine-dining restaurant, Pebbles, showcases the very best of the region's seasonal produce, expertly paired with exquisite local wines.

Peppers' enviable location makes it the perfect launchpad for exploring the region's bespoke distilleries, rolling vines and glorious shores, with Rye Ocean Beach, Red Hill's wineries and the iconic Cape Schanck Lighthouse all accessible within a 20-minute drive.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Begin each day with a sumptuous breakfast and golf course vistas at the stylish Pebbles Restaurant
- Celebrate on arrival with a complimentary bottle of wine waiting for you in your room
- Treat yourself to an exquisite dining experience with a 10% discount at Pebbles Restaurant
- Relax in your luxurious room until the very last moment with leisurely 12pm checkout
- Swing into your escape with complimentary golf cart hire when you play 18 holes

**Travelling with family?** Stay in a spacious One-Bedroom Suite for up to three adults or two adults and two children (see package for details).
offer_address: 55 Peter Thomson Drive, Fingal 3939, Victoria, Australia

title: A Day Trip to the Mornington Peninsula: Award-Winning Five-Course Lunch Experience with Wine Tasting
description:
The Mornington Peninsula is famed for its world-class wine, fresh produce and coastal charm, all of which is revealed in abundance at Ten Minutes by Tractor - an award-winning winery in Main Ridge. Unforgettable indulgence awaits around 90 minutes from Melbourne's CBD, where you'll indulge in the finest food and wine the region has to offer.

This elegant winery was founded back in 1997 when three family-owned vineyards converged - all ten minutes by tractor apart. New vineyards have since been added, and this exceptional experience allows you to immerse yourself in the magic of it all. The gourmet experience begins with a premium wine tasting of six wines. Afterward, settle in for a five-course degustation that combines exceptional local produce and attentive service for a truly memorable experience. The carefully crafted menu will not disappoint, as Head Chef Hayden Ellis’ passion for local ingredients shines through each bite. With previous experience at The Fat Duck and The Ledbury in the UK, followed by Dinner by Heston in Melbourne, the chef's masterful skills are evident in the delivery of creative textures and flavours. This is a culinary trip through regional Victoria you don't want to miss.
offer_address: 1333 Mornington-Flinders Rd, Main Ridge VIC 3928

title: Multi-Award-Winning Jackalope Stay in Mornington Peninsula's Wine Region
description:
Treat yourself to ultimate luxury in the Mornington Peninsula wine region at multi-award-winning Jackalope. This whimsical, show-stopping hotel draws you down a rabbit hole of art installations, chef-hatted cuisine and fine wines, all while offering the highest level of service and breathtaking vineyard surrounds.

Your package includes daily breakfast at chef-hatted Doot Doot Doot, one lunch for two at chef-hatted Rare Hare, a wine tasting at the cellar door, a complimentary minibar refreshed daily, a welcome drink each at Flaggerdoot bar and complimentary hotel car transfer service.

⏱**Buy now, book later**: Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: 166 Balnarring Rd, Merricks North VIC 3926

title: Serene Mornington Peninsula Peppers Escape with Daily Breakfast
description:
Swing into a secluded coastal escape at Mornington Peninsula's Peppers Moonah Links Resort, a romantic retreat perfectly located only moments from the award-winning Peninsula Hot Springs. Crowning the entry to two 18-hole championship golf courses, this upscale oasis boasts sweeping vistas from every angle, with each room and suite offering private balconies with glorious rolling green views. Savour every bite at the spectacular onsite Pebbles Restaurant, which effortlessly showcases the best of the region's seasonal produce, expertly paired with exquisite local wines - chips triple-fried in duck fat, stuffed king mushrooms and olive oil cake parfaits await.

Peppers' enviable location makes it the perfect launchpad for exploring the region's bespoke distilleries, rolling vines and glorious shores, with Rye Ocean Beach, Red Hill's wineries and the dramatic bluffs of the Cape Schanck Lighthouse all accessible within a 20-minute drive.
offer_address: 55 Peter Thomson Drive, Fingal 3939, Victoria, Australia

title: Jackalope, VIC: Australia’s Most Talked About Hotel
description: Jackalope Hotel needs no introduction. As the hottest hotel opening of the past year and the only Australian hotel to appear on the Condé Nast Traveler's Hot List 2018, this Mornington Peninsula property has to be experienced. It's whimsical, show-stopping and it draws you down a rabbit hole of art installations, chef-hatted cuisine and fine wines, all while offering the highest level of luxury and breathtaking vineyard surrounds.
offer_address: 166 Balnarring Rd, Merricks North VIC 3926

title: Mornington Peninsula Hot Springs Experience with Private Cabana, Invigorating Wellness Experience & Gourmet Picnic Hamper
description:
Soothe the mind, body and spirit with a tranquil half-day natural hot springs bathing experience at the award-winning Peninsula Hot Springs on Victoria’s Mornington Peninsula. Begin your experience by locking away your personal belongings securely in a locker and slipping on a plush robe, your official uniform for the day. Settle into your private Relaxation Cabana, your exclusive space for the next four hours, where you can lounge on daybeds and order drinks and snacks delivered to you from the Bath House Café (additional expenses apply).

Enjoy access to over 70 onsite bathing experiences, including thermal mineral spring pools, the Turkish steam bath, cave pool, hilltop pool (where you can enjoy 360-degree views of the surrounding landscape), a subterranean sauna, reflexology walk, massaging thermal mineral showers and lakeside pool. For your own slice of serenity, venture into the exclusive, adults-only (16+) Spa Dreaming Centre. Return to your cabana to enjoy a gourmet picnic hamper per person, which can be collected from the Wellness Centre from 11am onwards. Think local cheeses, quince paste, savoury scones and fresh fruit, among other delicious treats. For the ultimate indulgence, choose a 45-minute wellness experience to cap off the day. Opt for a Fire & Ice wellness experience and be invigorated by the powers of hot and cold therapy in the state-of-the-art saunas and ice cave. You'll also learn the key benefits of this experience from expert wellness hosts. Or, go for a detoxifying body clay wellness experience and learn about the healing powers and cooling effects of clay.
offer_address: 140 Springs Lane, Fingal, Mornington Peninsula, Victoria, 3939

title: Mornington Peninsula: Mother's Day Photoshoot & Mystery Picnic for Two Adults & Two Children
description:
Give the gift of lifelong memories for Mother's Day and say 'I love you,' with a 30-minute professional photoshoot experience and gourmet mystery picnic with Travelshoot and AmazingCo. Lose yourself in the strikingly beautiful Mornington Peninsula and be welcomed with a drink as you arrive at your mystery location (confirmed one week prior to the experience). Get ready to strike a pose and be guided by your expert photographer on the day, as they capture a series of candid, natural and relaxed moments - including warm smiles and tender hugs shared between you and your loved ones.

After successfully capturing those special moments, you will be treated to a mystery picnic adventure together as a family. Hop in your car and make your way to your mystery picnic location, where you'll use your smartphones to follow clues and solve puzzles to collect your locally sourced, gourmet picnic food bit by bit while exploring incredible landscapes. Each clue you solve will lead you closer to your next picnic food pickup, before ending at the final picnic location. For an extra special way to end the day, walk away with one gift bag filled with treats and vouchers - just for mum.
offer_address: 5 Lagoon Court

title: Relaxing Mornington Peninsula Stay with Hot Springs Upgrade Available
description: Experience a secluded coastal escape in the Mornington Peninsula at Peppers Moonah Links Resort. With two golf courses and a location next to the popular Peninsula Hot Springs, it’s a relaxing break just 90 minutes from Melbourne. The Peninsula has something for everyone: from gorgeous coastlines to surf beaches, wineries, maze gardens, cosy pubs and more. Included is a daily buffet breakfast for two, buy-one-get-one free on 18-hole green fees and one glass of house beer, wine or sparkling per person. Hot Springs Upgrade with VIP Priority Passes available.
offer_address: 55 Peter Thomson Drive, Fingal 3939, Victoria, Australia

title: Pet-Friendly Getaway on Victoria’s Mornington Peninsula
description: Experience Victoria’s most picturesque gourmet playground, the Mornington Peninsula, with a stay at Views Cape Schanck Boutique Hotel. Animal lovers will be in their element, with dedicated pet-friendly rooms, meaning you can bring your furry friend along (see ‘Fine Print’ for surcharges). Included is a breakfast hamper, a bottle of local wine on arrival and a lazy 12 noon checkout. Plus, one child aged 12 years and under stays free!
offer_address: 41 Trent Jones Dr, Cape Schanck VIC 3939

description: Jackalope needs no introduction. offer_address: 166 Balnarring Rd, Merricks North VIC 3926

title: Mornington Peninsula Group Escape for up to 6 Guests with Welcome Wine
description:
Tucked away on the Mornington Peninsula and framed by noteworthy cool-climate wineries, acclaimed restaurants, rolling hills and shimmering beaches is where you will find Long View @ Red Hill from Holiday Shacks - an expansive four-bedroom, architecturally designed property perfect for families and groups. Set upon 1.6 acres of verdant bushland, this peaceful spot offers some much-needed respite from the city and boasts sweeping views of Port Phillip Bay and the Tuerong Valley, with the towns of Red Hill and Dromana just a short drive away.

Drop your bags on arrival and feel immediately at ease as you step into the light-filled foyer that opens onto a spacious kitchen, living and dining area. Head to the upper or lower lounge area and curl up on the couch with a book and a glass of local wine by the fireplace or take a seat on the expansive deck area furnished with sun loungers, a large dining table and a BBQ - perfect for entertaining - all while soaking up the sweeping views. With four bedrooms and space for up to six guests, this is the dream escape for groups and families.
offer_address: 25 Luton Avenue Red Hill Vic 3937 Australia

title: Boutique Mornington Peninsula Lancemore Winery Stay Just 90 Minutes from Melbourne
description:
Hidden among the Mornington Peninsula's vine-clad hills, sweeping bushland and rugged cliffs lies Lancemore Lindenderry Red Hill, the perfect boutique retreat only 90 minutes from Melbourne's CBD. The porcelain-white boutique hotel stands tall in the centre of 34 acres of romantic greenery, offering guests European-style accommodation with a modern Australian twist. It's the perfect base to experience the region's treasure trove of artisanal distilleries, cherished cool-climate vineyards, seaside villages and tremendous natural beauty.

Savour exceptional fare at The Dining Room restaurant, where hand-selected, regional produce is served with loving care, then stroll through acres of flawlessly manicured gardens, enjoy a picnic hamper by the lake or relax in front of the hotel's cosy fireplace. For those who like to sip throughout their trip, the Lancemore Lindenderry Red Hill's cellar door is the place to discover award-winning wines.
offer_address: 142 Arthurs Seat Rd, Red Hill VIC 3937

title: Boutique Mornington Peninsula Lancemore Winery Stay Just 90 Minutes from Melbourne
description: Hidden among the Mornington Peninsula's vine-clad hills, sweeping bushland and windswept cliffs lies Lancemore Lindenderry Red Hill, the perfect boutique retreat only 90 minutes from Melbourne's CBD. The porcelain-white boutique hotel stands tall in the centre of 34 acres of romantic greenery, offering guests European-style accommodation with a modern Australian twist, and is the perfect base to experience the region's treasure trove of artisanal distilleries, cherished cool-climate vineyards, seaside villages and tremendous natural beauty. Savour exceptional fare at The Dining Room restaurant or for those who like to sip throughout their trip, the Lancemore Lindenderry Red Hill's cellar door is the place to discover award-winning wines.
offer_address: 142 Arthurs Seat Rd, Red Hill VIC 3937

title: Multi-Award-Winning Mornington Peninsula Wine Lovers' Haven with Hatted Restaurant & Spa
description:
Treat yourself to ultimate luxury in the Mornington Peninsula wine region at this multi-award-winning stay. This whimsical, show-stopping hotel draws you down a rabbit hole of art installations, chef-hatted cuisine and fine wines, all while offering the highest level of service and breathtaking vineyard surrounds.

Sit under a 10,000 globe chandelier at Doot Doot Doot, one of Victoria's best restaurants, savour woodfired fare at Rare Hare, cheers to your stay over delectable wines and cocktails at Flaggerooot, melt away during a hot stone massage at the spa and plunge into the 30-metre infinity pool during your acclaimed winery stay.
